channel.title: Private Server Questions ^^
channel.description:
Hey guys, I have two questions... One of which, no one can seem to help me with... any way, here they are:
1. Does anyone have the coordinates for the Godwars room where you have to kill 20 Saradomin Priests... Once you have killed 20 Saradomin Priests you can enter into a cave and then you can choose which god room to go into. (Saradomin, Zamorak, Bandos, Armadyl). And, just to be slightly more clear, when you enter said cave it says "All your Godwars kills drain from you". I am using a 317 source called PwnScape and I can't get into that room, so I just need the coordinates so I can tele there.
2. Also, is there any way to change the reward items you get once you finish a quest??? If so, would someone please explain how I do so.
Thanks ~ Ziege Terra ~

item.title: Private Server Questions ^^
item.dc:creator: @Ziege_Terra_117 Ziege Terra 117
item.description:
@Ziege_Terra_117 wrote:

Okay, thanks… but I still need the Coordinates… if anyone knows… well, I’de give rep if I could hehe

Read full topic

item.title: Private Server Questions ^^
item.dc:creator: @kidzcoder kidzcoder
item.description:
@kidzcoder wrote:

idk the coords but for the quest thing go to client.java
and search for the item id and change it?

Read full topic
